record.title: RECOGNIZING THE AFRICAN AMERICAN SPIRITUAL AS A NATIONAL TREASURE
record.chair: The pending business is the question of suspending the rules and agreeing to the resolution, H. Res. 120.
record.narrative: The Clerk read the title of the resolution.
record.chair: The question is on the motion offered by the gentlewoman from California (Mrs. Davis) that the House suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, H. Res. 120, on which the yeas and nays are ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, on rollcall No. 79 I was unavoidably detained. Had I been present, I would have voted "yea."
